subject: Re: [junit] testing generated file by a template engine
msgSnippet: ... _JUnit Recipes_ devotes a few recipes to testing with Velocity templates. There, I focus on using them to generate web pages, but the basic ideas will be
messageBody:
amine achergui wrote:
> Hi all,
> I want to test the generated file by a template engine.
> The template files in my cas are supposed to produce java source code.
> I use velocity as template engine.
> That test harness may be considered as a none-unit testbut it code that must
> be tested.

_JUnit Recipes_ devotes a few recipes to testing with Velocity
templates. There, I focus on using them to generate web pages, but the
basic ideas will be valuable to you.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.info
Your guide to software craftsmanship
JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
2005 Gordon Pask Award for contribution Agile Software Practice
